con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions name="Archive" targetNamespace="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs" xmlns:comm="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/assets/types" xmlns:mtom="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy/optimizedmimeserialization" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs" xmlns:types="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs/types" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsp="http://www.w3.org/ns/ws-policy" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs/types" schemaLocation="JobsTypes.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetJobStatusResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:GetJobStatusResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitJobUsingParametersResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:SubmitJobUsingParametersResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetProfilesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:GetProfilesResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteJobsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:DeleteJobsResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="PauseJobsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:PauseJobs" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteJobsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:DeleteJobs" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetProfilesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:GetProfiles" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitJobUsingProfileResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:SubmitJobUsingProfileResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CancelJobsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:CancelJobs" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RetryJobsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:RetryJobsResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RetryJobsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:RetryJobs" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CancelJobsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:CancelJobsResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="JobsFault"> <wsdl:part element="types:JobsFault" name="fault"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeJobsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:ResumeJobsResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitJobUsingProfileRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:SubmitJobUsingProfile" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResumeJobsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:ResumeJobs" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitJobUsingParametersRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:SubmitJobUsingParameters" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="PauseJobsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="types:PauseJobsResponse" name="body"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetJobStatusRequest"> <wsdl:part element="types:GetJobStatus" name="body"></wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="comm:UserCredentials" name="credentialsHeader"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="JobsPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="CancelJobs"> <wsdl:documentation>Cancel a Media Service or Transfer job.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:CancelJobsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:CancelJobsResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteJobs"> <wsdl:documentation>Delete a Media Services job. If called on a Transfer Job, will pause the job and return an error.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:DeleteJobsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:DeleteJobsResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetJobStatus"> <wsdl:documentation>Gets the status of a Media Services or Transfer job.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetJobStatusRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetJobStatusResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetProfiles"> <wsdl:documentation>Gets the configured profiles for a list of services in Media Services.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetProfilesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetProfilesResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="PauseJobs"> <wsdl:documentation>Pause one or more Transfer jobs. Not supported for Media Services jobs.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:PauseJobsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:PauseJobsResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ResumeJobs"> <wsdl:documentation>Resume one or more Transfer jobs. Not supported for Media Services.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ResumeJobsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:ResumeJobsResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="RetryJobs"> <wsdl:documentation>Retry one or more Transfer jobs. Currently not supported for Media Services (expected in future version).
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:RetryJobsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:RetryJobsResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitJobUsingParameters"> <wsdl:documentation>Submit a Media Services job using a set of parameters.
Integrators should note: In order to prevent the Media Services Engine from being overloaded by requests, a threshold has been put in place. No more than 20 jobs per minute may be submitted to the Media Services Engine via Interplay WS. If the limit is exceeded, the submit job request will be rejected with an error saying that the limit has been reached.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitJobUsingParametersRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:SubmitJobUsingParametersResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitJobUsingProfile"> <wsdl:documentation>Submit a Media Services job using a pre-defined profile.
Integrators should note: In order to prevent the Media Services Engine from being overloaded by requests, a threshold has been put in place. No more than 20 jobs per minute may be submitted to the Media Services Engine via Interplay WS. If the limit is exceeded, the submit job request will be rejected with an error saying that the limit has been reached.
Since: 2.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitJobUsingProfileRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:SubmitJobUsingProfileResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:JobsFault" name="JobsFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="JobsPortBinding" type="tns:JobsPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CancelJobs"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:CancelJobsRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteJobs"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:DeleteJobsRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetJobStatus"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:GetJobStatusRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetProfiles"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:GetProfilesRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="PauseJobs"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:PauseJobsRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ResumeJobs"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:ResumeJobsRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="RetryJobs"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:RetryJobsRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitJobUsingParameters"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:SubmitJobUsingParametersRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitJobUsingProfile"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:SubmitJobUsingProfileRequest" part="credentialsHeader" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="JobsFault"> <soap:fault name="JobsFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Jobs"> <wsdl:documentation>The Jobs Service is a SOAP-based entry point into the Avid Interplay Media Services Engine as well as a control interface for Media Services and Transfer jobs.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:port binding="tns:JobsPortBinding" name="JobsPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost/services/Jobs"/> <wsp:Policy> <!--This service supports both MTOM-enabled and non-MTOM-enabled clients--> <mtom:OptimizedMimeSerialization wsp:Optional="true"/> </wsp:Policy> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs/types" version="1.0" xmlns:comm="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/assets/types" xmlns:tns="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/jobs/types" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/assets/types" schemaLocation="JobsCommon.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="CancelJobs" type="tns:CancelJobsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CancelJobsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the CancelJobs operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Media Services and Transfer jobs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CancelJobsResponse" type="tns:CancelJobsResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CancelJobsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the CancelJobs operation. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DeleteJobs" type="tns:DeleteJobsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteJobsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the DeleteJobs operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Media Services jobs. If a Transfer job URI is passed in, the job will be paused and an error returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DeleteJobsResponse" type="tns:DeleteJobsResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteJobsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the DeleteJobs operation. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="GetJobStatus" type="tns:GetJobStatusType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetJobStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the GetJobStatus operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Media Services and Transfer jobs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="GetJobStatusResponse" type="tns:GetJobStatusResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetJobStatusResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the GetJobStatus operation. Returns a list of JobStatusTypes with status information for each JobURI that was passed in. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="JobStatusTypes" type="tns:JobStatusListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="GetProfiles" type="tns:GetProfilesType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetProfilesType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the GetProfiles operation. The WorkgroupURI represents the workgroup to query the Media Services Engine on. Services is a list of services to get profiles for (ex. com.avid.dms.archive). If ShowParameters is true, a list of name/value parameters defining the profile will also be returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="WorkgroupURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Services" type="tns:ServiceListType"/> <xsd:element default="false" minOccurs="0" name="ShowParameters" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="GetProfilesResponse" type="tns:GetProfilesResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetProfilesResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the GetProfiles operation. Returns a list of ProfileTypes. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Results" type="tns:ProfileListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PauseJobs" type="tns:PauseJobsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PauseJobsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the PauseJobs operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Transfer jobs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PauseJobsResponse" type="tns:PauseJobsResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PauseJobsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the PauseJobs operation. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ResumeJobs" type="tns:ResumeJobsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ResumeJobsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the ResumeJobs operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Transfer jobs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ResumeJobsResponse" type="tns:ResumeJobsResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ResumeJobsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the ResumeJobs operation. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RetryJobs" type="tns:RetryJobsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RetryJobsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the RetryJobs operation. The only parameter is a list of JobURIs that reference Transfer jobs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURIs" type="tns:JobURIListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RetryJobsResponse" type="tns:RetryJobsResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RetryJobsResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the RetryJobs operation. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SubmitJobUsingParameters" type="tns:SubmitJobUsingParametersType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitJobUsingParametersType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the SubmitJobUsingParameters operation. Service represents the service to submit to (ex., com.avid.dms.archive). InterplayURI references the asset to perform the service on. Parameters is the list of name/value parameters that define the job. SourceServerType determines the source server for the asset. Valid values are "Archive" and "Assets" (default).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Service" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Parameters" type="tns:ProfileParameterType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="SourceServerType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SubmitJobUsingParametersResponse" type="tns:SubmitJobUsingParametersResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitJobUsingParametersResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the SubmitJobUsingParameters operation. The JobURI represents the job that was submitted and can be used to track and manage the job. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="JobURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SubmitJobUsingProfile" type="tns:SubmitJobUsingProfileType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitJobUsingProfileType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameters for the SubmitJobUsingProfile operation. Service represents the service to submit to (ex., com.avid.dms.archive). Profile represents the specific profile to user. InterplayURI references the asset to perform the service on. SourceServerType determines the source server for the asset. Valid values are "Archive" and "Assets" (default).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Service" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Profile" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="SourceServerType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SubmitJobUsingProfileResponse" type="tns:SubmitJobUsingProfileResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitJobUsingProfileResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response from the SubmitJobUsingProfile operation. The JobURI represents the job that was submitted and can be used to track and manage the job. Errors contains a list of errors that occurred. If there are no errors, the Errors element is omitted entirely. A successful operation does not have any resulting return objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="JobURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Errors" type="comm:ErrorListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <!--COMMON TYPES (Alphabetical)--> <xsd:complexType name="JobStatusListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>a list of JobStatusTypes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="JobStatus" type="tns:JobStatusType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="JobStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Contain a JobURI, its status (ex. RUNNING), optional Description (usually only provided for errors), and PercentComplete (only valid when RUNNING).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="JobURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Status" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="PercentComplete" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="JobURIListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>interplay:///?jobid= ex. interplay://WGA/DMS?jobid=1260980985656.1 ex. interplay://WGA/XFER?jobid=123_wga-tm</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="JobURI" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProfileListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of ProfileTypes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Profile" type="tns:ProfileType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProfileType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The profile name, service, and parameters for a configured profile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Service" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Parameters" type="tns:ProfileParameterType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProfileParameterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of parameters used in a profile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Parameter" type="tns:ParameterType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ParameterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A name/value pair representing a parameter for a Media Services job.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="Name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of service names (ex. com.avid.dms.archive).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="JobsFault" type="tns:JobsFaultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="JobsFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A system error that occurred during the processing of a request. The Code is a short string representing a type of error. The Message contains a short description of the error. The Details contains additional information more useful for debugging.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Details" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="comm:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Code" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/assets/types" version="1.0" xmlns:tns="http://avid.com/interplay/ws/assets/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="FileLocationDetailsListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of FileLocationDetailsType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="FileLocationDetails" type="tns:FileLocationDetailsType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FileLocationDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A pairing of an InterplayURI and its corresponding FileLocation types</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="FileLocations" type="tns:FileLocationListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FileLocationListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of FileLocationDetailsTypes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="FileLocation" type="tns:FileLocationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FileLocationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The details relating to a media file, such as name, track, status, file path, type, creator, format, and size.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Track" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Status" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="FilePath" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Type" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CreatedBy" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Format" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Size" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AssetDescriptionListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of AssetDescriptions.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AssetDescription" type="tns:AssetDescriptionType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AssetDescriptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A pairing of an InterplayURI representing an asset along with a set of attributes describing it.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Attributes" type="tns:AttributeListType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AttributeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents an attribute. Can be used as a reference to an attribute by leaving the content empty, or can represent an attribute and its value, with its value being the content of the tag.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="Group" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="Name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AttributeListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of attributes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Attribute" type="tns:AttributeType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AttributeConditionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Attribute" type="tns:AttributeType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Condition" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CategoryConditionType"> <xsd:attribute name="Category" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FileInUseConditionType"> <xsd:attribute name="InUse" type="xsd:boolean" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResolutionConditionType"> <xsd:attribute name="Resolution" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="Condition" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An error that occurred during the processing of a request. The Code is a short string representing a type of error. The Message contains a short description of the error. The Details contains additional information more useful for debugging. If the error pertained to a particular node, an InterplayURI will be specified.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Details" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Code" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of Errors.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Error" type="tns:ErrorType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExtensionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An extension element that allows for compatibility with future versions. This helps allow Avid to extend future versions of the service without breaking existing clients. This pattern is discussed by Dave Orchard in several articles, the best of which are: http://www.pacificspirit.com/Authoring/Compatibility/ExaminingElementWildcardSiblings.html http://www.xml.com/pub/a/2004/10/27/extend.html?page=4</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" namespace="##targetNamespace" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InterplayURIListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of InterplayURIs. An InterplayURI can represent a node by workgroup and path, moniker, or MOBID. An InterplayURI has the following form:
Path: interplay://$WG/$PATH ex. interplay://WGA3/projects/race08/debate.jpg
Moniker: interplay://$WG?moniker=$MONIKER ex. interplay://WGA3?moniker=abc123
Mob ID: interplay://$WG?mobid=$MOBID ex. interplay://WGA3?mobid=060a2b340101010101010f0013-000000-0000000000000032-060e2b347f7f-2a80
Source ID: interplay://$WG?sourceid=$MOBID interplay://WGA?sourceid=060a2b340101010101010f0013-000000-000000003d40ede1-060e2b347f7f-2a80
Media Services Job: interplay://WGA/DMS?jobid=1260980985656.1
Transfer Job: interplay://WGA/XFER?jobid=27_osi-tm
User: interplay://$WG?username=$USER ex. interplay://WGA3?username=jsmith
Group: interplay://$WG?group=$GROUP ex. interplay://WGA3?group=journalist
Workgroup: interplay://$WG ex. interplay://WGA3</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="InterplayURI" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchGroupType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AttributeCondition" type="tns:AttributeConditionType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="CategoryCondition" type="tns:CategoryConditionType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="FileInUseCondition" type="tns:FileInUseConditionType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ResolutionCondition" type="tns:ResolutionConditionType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="SearchGroup" type="tns:SearchGroupType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="Operator" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="Negated" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UserCredentials" type="tns:UserCredentialsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UserCredentialsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user credentials are the username and password used to authenticate into the assets server. They must be present with every request as part of the SOAP header. Invalid credentials will result in a returned error.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Password" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Extension" type="tns:ExtensionType"/> <xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
